Package senselogic.sitevision.api.security.jaas.callback

Callback classes for custom JAAS modules/filters.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NodePrincipalCallback
    JAAS callback for mapping ids to JCR user nodes.
    RedirectCallback
    JAAS callback for requesting a redirect.
    ServletCallback
    JAAS callback for accessing request and response.
    SharedStateCallback
    JAAS callback for fetching request headers.
    UserAttributeCallback
    JAAS callback for fetching user attributes from the directory.
    UserPrincipalCallback
    JAAS callback for mapping usernames to Principals.

Package senselogic.sitevision.api.security.jaas.callback Description

Callback classes for custom JAAS modules/filters.

Important legacy note! As of Sitevision 3 this package and all its content has been moved (from senselogic.sitevision.security.jaas.callback). Previously implemented custom JAAS filters/modules using this package must be re-compiled in order to run in Sitevision 3.

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
